name: buyer_intent_to_exchange_failure_days
title: Close of Escrow (COE) Extension Days
label: COE Extension
description: By how many days would you like to push out the COE date for this offer if your exchange of property fails to close on time?
tips: Consider potential delays in your 1031 exchange process and allow enough time for completion. Consult with your qualified intermediary about typical timeframes.
small_print: The extension period specified here will be included in your purchase agreement and will automatically apply if the exchange fails to complete by the original close of escrow date.

buyer_intent_to_exchange_failure_days.name: buyer_intent_to_exchange_failure_days

suggested.hint: The input value falls outside of suggested values

buyer_intent_to_exchange_failure_days.tooltip: Enter number of days to extend COE
